title: How to write a 5 paragraph essay paper - Quora

response.answer_text: Use classical 5 paragraph essay structure: Introduction Begin it with an “attention grabber”(interesting fact, anecdote, statistics , etc) following by the thesis statement (should tell in 1-2 sentence(s), what your overall point or argument is) Body paragraphs: 1st- should contain the strongest argument, most significant example, cleverest illustration, or an obvious beginning point 2nd - should contain the weakest argument, weakest example, weakest illustration 3rd - should contain the second strongest argument and second most significant example Conclusion It begins with a restatement of your main point. A conclusion paragraph should never introduce any new information. Look through this article to find more tips on writing this kind of essay. Good luck!
